channel.title: Admins losing stuff and teleport prob
channel.description: Hey. I'm using Devolution 9 u 3 from killamess and i got an problem. How am able to make so you cannot teleport during an duel and up to 20 level wilderniss? And how i make so playerrights 2 and 3 doesnt lose stuff if they get killed by npc / or in wildy by pking? Devo here NOT delta.
